summary: A monk turned body-builder, with the gift to see into people's lives, befriends a female cop, and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny.
cast: Andy Lau|Cecilia Cheung|Eddie Cheung|Wong Chun|Karen Tong|Wen Zhong Yu|Lian Sheng Hou|Sheng Wei He|Meng Zhang|Tin-Bo Tam|Kwok-Choi Hon|Chi Wai Wong|Wah-Wo Wong|Bun Yuen
director: Directors: Johnnie To, Ka-Fai Wai (as Wai Ka Fai)
title: Dai zek lo
